channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND

item.title: Report E-2023080013
item.description:
Report E-2023080013

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-22T15:12:15+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-21
  • City: WEST FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDEX FREIGHT, INC.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
